item.title: Donkey Kong Bananza announced for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/donkey-kong-bananza-announced-for-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Due out on July 17.

Nintendo has announced Donkey Kong Bananza for Switch 2. It will launch on July 17 for $69.99. In Japan, the physical edition will cost 8,980 yen and the digital edition will cost 7,980 yen.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

Get ready for Donkey Kong Bananza, a brand-new 3D platforming action adventure—vailable exclusively on Nintendo Switch 2. Crash, bash, and climb through nearly everything in DK’s path and tear off chunks of terrain to swing around and throw in groundbreaking exploration. The more that is demolished with powerful punches, the more areas open up to discover. Break on through this adventure full of mayhem, surprises and bananas when Donkey Kong Bananza crashes onto Nintendo Switch 2.

item.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade coming to Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/final-fantasy-vii-remake-intergrade-coming-to-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Release date not announced.

Square Enix will release Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade for Switch 2, the company announced. A release date was not announced.

Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade is an enhanced version of Final Fantasy VII Remake. It first launched for PlayStation 5 on June 10, 2021, followed by PC via Epic Games Store on December 16, 2021, and PC via Steam on June 17, 2022. It is the predecessor to Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, which is currently available for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Here is an overview of the game, via Square Enix:

In Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade, players follow the story of ex-SOLDIER operative turned mercenary, Cloud Strife, as he lends his aid to the underground resistance group Avalanche in the mako-powered city of Midgar. In the fight against the shadowy Shinra Electric Power Company, Cloud and his comrades are thrust into a larger conflict to determine the fate of the planet. Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade also includes an exhilarating original story arc, Final Fantasy VII Remake Episode INTERmission, which brings Wutai ninja Yuffie Kisaragi to the forefront as she infiltrates the city of Midgar during the events of the base game.

With over seven million copies shipped and sold digitally worldwide on the PlayStation and PC platforms, this upcoming release marks the series’ debut on a Nintendo system, giving a new audience of players a chance to experience 2020’s The Game Awards RPG of the Year* for the first time ever.

item.title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar adds Switch 2 version
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/story-of-seasons-grand-bazaar-adds-switch-2-version

  • PC
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Due out alongside Switch and PC on August 2.

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar will launch for Switch 2 alongside its previously announced Switch and PC (Steam) versions on August 27, Marvelous announced.

The game will be available in a standard physical edition for $49.99 on Switch and $59.99 on Switch 2, and a physical Premium Edition including a copy of Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar, a plush Suffolk sheep, a cloth poster, a physical art book with over 115 pages of artwork, and an original soundtrack CD, for $69.99 on Switch and $79.99 on Switch 2.

The title will also be available digitally on Nintendo eShop for Switch and Switch 2, and PC via Steam. The standard edition, which includes the game and the downloadable content “Cow Set,” will be $49.99 Switch and Windows PC, and $59.99 on Switch 2. A Digital Deluxe edition, which includes the game, the downloadable content “Cow Set,” and the downloadable content “Trunk of Transformation,” will be available on Switch and PC for $59.99; and a Super Digital Deluxe edition, which includes the game, the downloadable content “Cow Set,” the downloadable content “Trunk of Transformation,” a digital soundtrack, and a digital art book, will be available on Switch and PC for $69.99.

Switch 2 players can also upgrade with a “Digital Deluxe” downloadable content set containing the downloadable content “Trunk of Transformation” for $9.99, and a “Super Digital Deluxe” downloadable content set containing the “Trunk of Transformation” downloadable content, a digital soundtrack, and digital art book, for $19.99.

Here is an overview of the game, via Marvelous:

Inspired by the classic handheld title, Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar builds up and improves on the original in every conceivable way. The world is bigger and more alive than ever thanks to incredible new visuals, new characters, an expanded story, and full character voice work in story events—a series first. Take advantage of Zephyr Town’s unique weather, using the wind to make travel and farm tasks a breeze!

Zephyr Town’s bazaar was once one of the grandest in the world, drawing customers and peddlers from all four corners of the globe. These days, though, the bazaar has more tumbleweeds than customers. It’s up to you to turn its fortunes around! Raise animals, harvest crops, craft rare delicacies, then sell your wares at your very own stall in the bazaar. As the bazaar business grows, new goods and services will arrive, which you can use to improve your farm. Help return prosperity to the bazaar, and Zephyr Town will thrive once again!

A launch title for Switch 2.

DELTARUNE Chapters 3 and 4 will launch on June 5 for PlayStation 5, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam, creator tobyfox announced.

As previously announced, Chapters 3, 4, and 5 will be paid releases when they launch. Chapters 1 and 2 are currently playable free of charge across PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam and itch.io.
